text: Hello, would you like to be involved in saving a child's life?
How so?
By agreeing to contribute to Save the Children.  It is a reputable, viable organization which provides resources to impoverished children.
I have already donated to another charity this month.
I understand, but this organization will directly impact a child's life by adding additional resources and support to ensure that children are able to lead healthy, happy, productive lives.
I donate to St Judes every month which benefits children too. I wish I could donate more, but I can't
Totally understandable. We all have our own obligations in our personal lives.  Do you mind if I ask you if you have ever gone with out food, shelter, or the basic necessities?
I have been nearly homeless at a point in my life.  That is why I donate money to help take care of others, pay it forward if you will.

Exactly, I myself have been homeless, gone to bed without food as a child,  had no heat or water in the dead of winter, which is why supporting Save the Children is so important! Just 1 donation could potentially change a child's opportunities in life!
Have you donated?
Absolutely.  Just like you mentioned earlier, I believe in pay
I am glad we are both able to help.  I just have already helped another organization this month and live paycheck to paycheck as it is.  I'm sure you understand.

My apology, I hit the enter button prematurely.  But I absolutely agree in paying it forward. I wholehartedly agree that our purpose in life is to be a blessing for someone else when we can.  Would you be willing to donate to the charity now?
I really can't.

You mentioned earlier that you live paycheck to paycheck, I am in the exact same boat. But did you know that your donation can be directly deducted from your task payment?  You can choose any amount from O to $2.
Oh, I didn't know that!  How do I do that?
The research team will collect all donations and send it to Save The Children.
Ok, I'd be happy to donate half of my earning.
Excellent. I applaud your efforts for being part of the solution.  If you would like to gather additional information, please go to  URL   Thanks so much!
Sure thing!  I am glad I was able to help.
